objective: Seeking a challenging and rewarding position as a software developer in a dynamic and innovative company.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
Associate of Applied Science in Computer Programming

work_experience.title: Software Developer
responsibilities: Develop and maintain software applications using languages such as Java and Python
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and deliver high-quality solutions
Provide technical guidance and support to junior developers on the team

work_experience.title: Software Intern
responsibilities: Assisted senior developers in the design and development of software applications
Performed code reviews and provided constructive feedback to improve code quality
Learned and applied new technologies and programming languages
